# Function det

Calculate the determinant of a matrix.


## Syntax

```js
math.det(x)
```

### Parameters

Parameter | Type | Description
--------- | ---- | -----------
`x` | Array &#124; Matrix | A matrix

### Returns

Type | Description
---- | -----------
number | The determinant of `x`


## Examples

```js
math.det([[1, 2], [3, 4]]); // returns -2

var A = [
  [-2, 2, 3],
  [-1, 1, 3],
  [2, 0, -1]
]
math.det(A); // returns 6
```
